content: this pattern can be worked as a 6 x 6 or 12 x 12 square or a blanket there is a video tutorial on my blog thru youtube for the square the pattern has pictures available at the end of each round to help you get the hang of working the spiral if you enjoy testing new patterns follow the link to my blog join as a follower and subscribe to emails using the google link in the top right corner to receive the postings for new testers wanted this is the quickest way to hear about openings for testers http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com happy crocheting donna
